snippet.title: The Life of Mr Pips - Game trailer
snippet.description:
🍓 "The Life of Mr Pips" coming 30th september 2020
❤️ Itch page: https://snuti.itch.io/the-life-of-mr-pips

"The Life of Mr Pips" is a delightful adventure game where you play an adorable little strawberry who's trying to find his place in life.🍓 Explore a fruitful world as Mr Pips, find your scattered family and go leaf rafting with cute blueberries. 🍃🌊 

🎵 Music by: Henning Høyer

◾◾◾◾◾◾◾◾◾◾◾◾◾◾◾◾◾◾

✨ Who are we and what are we doing ✨

👋 Hi, we are Snuti, a husband and wife dev team who is getting back into game development again and recording our journey along the way. We are currently working on some small games to learn more about game dev and to get ourselves started.

◾◾◾◾◾◾◾◾◾◾◾◾◾◾◾◾◾◾

✨Follow us✨

❤️ Web: https://snuti.net/
❤️ Twitch: https://twitch.tv/SnutiHQ
❤️ Twitter: https://twitter.com/SnutiHQ
❤️ Discord (Snuti Land): https://discord.gg/Faus5BH
❤️ Instagram: http://instagram.com/SnutiHQ
